Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Love is the message communicated by Miyazawa, and he was also a dedicated artist who did not place his creed before his creativity, and who chose the difficult path of a writer who was concerned with life. The world held in Miyazawa's poems is a world overflowing with diverse emotions and beautiful and bitter comedy.
